draughts.view

Class ColorScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.view.ColorScheme

  • public class ColorScheme
extends java.lang.Object
    part of the VIEW component in a MVC pattern for this application.
    DisplayColors holds the color scheme for board and pieces display: - DARK_FIELD_COLOR
    - LIGHT_FIELD_COLOR
    - OPPONENT_PIECE_COLOR
    - PLAYER_PIECE_COLOR
    - HIGHLIGHT_COLOR
    - LABEL_COLOR

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Color DARK_FIELD_COLOR
      Color value for BLACK squares.
      java.awt.Color HIGHLIGHT_COLOR
      Color value used for contrasting elements.
      java.awt.Color LABEL_COLOR
      Color value for the square's notations.
      java.awt.Color LIGHT_FIELD_COLOR
      Color value for WHITE squares.
      java.awt.Color OPPONENT_PIECE_COLOR
      Color value for the OPPONENT pieces.
      java.awt.Color PLAYER_PIECE_COLOR
      Color value for the (first) PLAYER pieces.
